solution_line_template: The seller has offered him the TV for {max_spend} - {initial_discount} = ${<<{max_spend}-{initial_discount}={price_after_initial_discount}>>}{price_after_initial_discount}.

The discount on the television was {price_after_initial_discount} * {additional_discount_percentage_numerator}/{percentage_denominator} = ${<<{price_after_initial_discount}*{additional_discount_percentage_numerator}/{percentage_denominator}={additional_discount_amount}>>}{additional_discount_amount}.

The final price of the television is therefore {price_after_initial_discount} - {additional_discount_amount} = ${<<{price_after_initial_discount}-{additional_discount_amount}={final_price}>>}{final_price}.
